name: Antecedent Device
customPrimary: Inflicts %s damage to all ships in a wide area aside from the firing ship, which receives %s damage if it is too close. The warhead is armed with a proximity trigger.

name: Diffraction Laser
customPrimary: Target takes %s more shield damage from all sources when illuminated by one beam, %s when illuminated by two or more beams.

name: Morningstar CIWS (Fighter)
customPrimary: Terminus Core improves damage against fighters and missiles by %s, range by %s, and enables the best possible point defense tracking.

name: Soliton Burst Emitter
customPrimary: Creates a space-time rift at the point of impact, dealing %s energy damage in a large radius.

name: Vampyr DEM Cruise Missile
customPrimary: Cruise missile unleashes %s EMP arcs near the target, dealing a combined %s energy and EMP damage. Each EMP arc has a chance to pierce shields based on target flux level.

name: Orthrus DEM Torpedo Pod
customPrimary: The torpedo fires a plasma beam at the target prior to impact, dealing approximately %s energy damage in a short burst. This damage is affected by missile damage modifiers and not energy weapon ones.

name: Orthrus DEM Torpedo Launcher
customPrimary: The torpedo fires a plasma beam at the target prior to impact, dealing approximately %s energy damage in a short burst. This damage is affected by missile damage modifiers and not energy weapon ones.

name: Orthrus DEM Salvo Launcher
customPrimary: The torpedo fires a plasma beam at the target prior to impact, dealing approximately %s energy damage in a short burst. This damage is affected by missile damage modifiers and not energy weapon ones.

name: Conversion Lance
customPrimary: Creates a large explosion at the point of impact, dealing %s additional damage in a %s damage high explosive burst to all targets in the area.

name: Electrostatic Projector
customPrimary: Fission ignition deals an additional %s energy damage. This damage is greatly reduced by armor.

name: Lightbringer CIWS
customPrimary: Integrated auto-tracker deals %s extra base weapon damage against missiles, which is not enhanced by hullmods or skills.

name: Morningstar CIWS
customPrimary: Integrated auto-tracker deals %s extra base weapon damage against missiles, which is not enhanced by hullmods or skills.

name: Muon Autolance
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor periodically arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage.

name: Muon Streamer
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor periodically arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage.

name: Stormlight Graser
customPrimary: Receives minimal benefit to sustained damage from increased %s, but will gain proportional increase to damage and flux cost from faster %s.

name: Iconoclast Interdictor Array
customPrimary: Disrupts the target's drive field, disabling a random number of engines for a short time.
